assignments.name: setIsNewOpportunity
assignments.label: Document that there was a new opportunity created for summary screen

rules.name: isExistingOpportunitySelected
rules.label: Existing Opportunity Selected from Other Account

rules.name: isFollowUp
rules.label: If there is a follow up date

value.stringValue: Follow up on the interaction you logged here: /lightning/r/Task/{!finalTaskId}/view

recordLookups.description: Get the Opportunities that this user owns so that they can be presented first for the interaction.
recordLookups.name: isNotUserOwnedOpportunity
recordLookups.label: NOT User Owned Opportunities

recordLookups.description: Get the Opportunities that this user owns so that they can be presented first for the interaction.
recordLookups.name: isUserOwnedOpportunities
recordLookups.label: User Owned Opportunities

fields.name: taskFollowUp
fields.fieldText: Do you need to follow up? Select date and I'll create a follow up task.

screens.name: searchOpportunityScreenD
screens.label: Search for Opportunity or create new

fields.name: whatOpportunity
fields.fieldText: Select Opportunity of Interaction

fields.name: searchForOpportunity
fields.fieldText: Or search for a different Opportunity

screens.name: selectAccountScreenB
screens.label: Search for Account or create new

fields.name: whoAccount
fields.fieldText: Select Account of Interaction

fields.name: searchForAccount
fields.fieldText: Or search for a different Account

screens.name: selectContactScreenA
screens.label: Search for Contact of interaction or create new

fields.name: whoInteract
fields.fieldText: Select Contact from your interaction

fields.name: summarytext
fields.fieldText:
Excellent! The interaction has been logged.


Here is a summary of what we've done together.

fields.name: summaryNewContactText
fields.fieldText: 1. See the new Contact here.

fields.name: newAccountSummary
fields.fieldText:
1. See the new Account here.
  2. We set the Primary Contact of the Account to this Contact.

fields.name: newOpportunitySummary
fields.fieldText:
1. See the new Opportunity here.
  2. We linked the Opportunity to this Account.
  3. We set the Primary Contact of the Opportunity to this Contact.

fields.name: newFollowUpTask
fields.fieldText:
1. See the Task here.
  2. We linked this Task to the this Contact.
  3. We linked this Task to this Account.

fields.name: summaryInteraction
fields.fieldText:
1. We logged your interaction as a completed Task here.
  2. We linked your interaction with this Opportunity.
  3. We linked this task to this Contact.

fields.name: startOver
fields.fieldText: Click `Next` to start logging another interaction.

subflows.name: getOrCreateAccount
subflows.label: Get Or Create Account for Interaction

subflows.name: getOrCreateContact
subflows.label: Get or Create Contact for Interaction

variables.description: A string of text like this: "Log a Call; Log an Interaction"
variables.name: taskSubjectsValuesForPicklist
